name: Turn back the clock： Hsinchu
summary: "Turn back the clock： Hsinchu" takes Hsinchu City, Taiwan as the main stage. Players can experience the historical time and space changes of Hsinchu while playing. The story will revolve around a historian and an agent of the Time and Space Security Agency. Players can alternately play the roles to be played according to the progress of the plot, and experience the same script from different perspectives as a starting point, through different perspectives. Encounter, correct, and repair historical...
